item.description:
March 13th, 2010
13 Hours – 13 Pubs – 13 Free Flights to Ireland
Starts in Boston… Continues in Ireland.


Join Tenon Tours and 1000 of our closest friends for Boston’s 2nd Annual St. Patrick’s Irish Pub Challenge, Saturday, March 13th. We’ve teamed up with thirteen of Boston’s best Irish pubs for a warm-up to the International Irish Pub Challenge which takes place in Ireland each year. The best part is, thirteen lucky pub crawlers will win a free flight to Ireland for the main event!

Date: Saturday, March 13th, 2010
Time: 11am – 12am
Registration: 11:00am – 1pm at Ned Devine’s (Team Green) and The Harp (Team White)
Schedule (subject to change):

Team Green:
* 11:00 -1:00 Ned Devine’s (registration)
* 1:00 – 1:15 Group Photo @ Government Center steps
* 1:15 – 3:00 Coogan’s / Au Tain / Jose McIntyre’s
* 3:00 – 5:00 McFadden’s / Kitty O’Shea’s / Trinity
* 5:00 – 7:00 Paddy O’s / Purple Shamrock / Hennessy’s
* 7:00 – 9:00 The Harp / Hurricane O’Reilly’s / McGann’s
* 9:00 – 12:00+ After-party at The Harp

Team White:
* 11:00 -1:00 The Harp (registration)
* 1:00 – 1:15 Group Photo @ Government Center steps
* 1:30 – 3:00 Paddy O’s / Purple Shamrock / Hennessy’s
* 3:00 – 5:00 Coogan’s / Au Tain / Jose McIntyre’s
* 5:00 – 7:00 McFadden’s / Kitty O’Shea’s / Trinity
* 7:00 – 9:00 Ned Devine’s / The Black Rose / Clark’s
* 9:00 – 12:00+ After-party at Ned Devine’s

Cost: SOLD-OUT

Price Includes:

* No Cover Charges at Scheduled Locations (yes, pubs were charging $10 cover to the public at 1pm last year!)
* Your Official Pub Challenge T-Shirt (Collector’s Edition)
* Your Official Pub Challenge Pub Mug
* Free Shamrock Beads, Paddy Hats, and other free swag (limited quantities)
* Your Official Pub Challenge Map
* Contests, Prizes, and Giveaways including 13 Chances to win a Free Flight to Ireland*
* $100 off the Spring or Fall International Irish Pub Challenge

*Flight Giveaway Terms: No purchase necessary. One prize will be given away each hour beginning at 12pm. Winner will be chosen from written submitted entries collected at the registration desk and notified by email. Each prize will be one (1) free flight voucher valid for airfare from Boston to Dublin International Airport (DUB) departing May 1st, 2010 and returning to Boston from Shannon International Airport (SNN) May 9th, 2010. Actual flight including airline, flight number, and times will be chosen by Tenon Tours. Value of the voucher should include base fare and fuel surcharge, but not exceed a retail of $500.00 USD. Flight voucher does not include departures taxes or fees. Prize must be used in conjunction with the purchase of the “land package” offered by Tenon Tours for the International Irish Pub Challenge.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be 1000 people waiting for you!
item.name: Boston's 2nd Annual Irish Pub Challenge
